message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $145. I think you'll find it's a great deal!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $130. Would you be willing to meet me there?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. How about we meet in the middle at $140?
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I was thinking more along the lines of $135. Would you be willing to go a bit lower?
